item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Welcome to my digital kitchen! I’m just getting started with this blog, and I’m as excited as a kachaudi fresh out of the kadahi!

Like a well-made kachaudi, I aim to keep things simple yet satisfying. No fancy garnishes or unnecessary complexity - just good, honest content that hits the spot.

Stay tuned for more! I’m just warming up the stove, and there’s plenty more cooking in the kitchen. 🍳

item.title: About Kachaudi Gali
item.description: New York has Park Avenue, almost every city in India has a MG (Mahatma Gandhi)Road .. but when you talk of streets, Banaras has Kachaudi Gali (कचौड़ी गली). Its an alley not a road, and is named after a famous savoury snack that is made of a blend of spicy stuffing in a round flat dough of refined wheat flour, that is deep fried. This description did not do justice to kachaudi as a snack, just like this blog will never do justice to Kachaudi Gali as a phenomenon.
